code: import axios from'axios';import{GET_CHARACTERS,ITEMS_LOADING,ADD_CHARACTER,DELETE_CHARACTER}from'./types';export var getCharacters=function getCharacters(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get('/api/characters').then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch({type:GET_CHARACTERS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log("ERROR: ".concat(err));});};};export var addCharacter=function addCharacter(character){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/characters',character).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_CHARACTER,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var deleteCharacter=function deleteCharacter(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/characters/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_CHARACTER,payload:id});});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:ITEMS_LOADING};};
